attractive finish all shawl variations taking the basic pattern for the long all shawl you can begin tweaking it for different yarns and styles b short version  swtc amaizing is on the heavy side of ball band number 3 light in my hands it works to a light worsted/dk gauge any tighter and the fabric will be too thick and stiff body row 1-17 with light worsted/dk weight yarn and j-10 6 mm hook work same way as long version page 10 for 17 row total for the body 128 stitches alter the strawberry lace to use a 9-stitch repeat as follows then work edging row 2-6 with fewer repeats short version
